content:
SISLgram -- Newsletter from the UC Irvine Scientific Inference Systems Laboratory

 

About SISLgram
English (USA)

Distributes the SISLgram, the newsletter for announcing research results from the UC Irvine Scientific Inference Systems Laboratory. See www.ics.uci.edu/~emj/newsletter.html . This list is not intended for discussions or high traffic. Please do not post to this list - just subscribe if you would like to receive this information, or unsubscribe if you wouldn't. Thank you.

To see the collection of prior postings to the list, visit the SISLgram Archives.

Using SISLgram

You can subscribe to the list, or change your existing subscription, in the sections below.

Subscribing to SISLgram

Subscribe to SISLgram by filling out the following form. This is a closed list, which means your subscription will be held for approval. You will be notified of the list moderator's decision by email. This is also a hidden list, which means that the list of members is available only to the list administrator.

    Your email address:  
    Your name (optional):  
    You may enter a privacy password below. This provides only mild security, but should prevent others from messing with your subscription. Do not use a valuable password as it will occasionally be emailed back to you in cleartext.

    If you choose not to enter a password, one will be automatically generated for you, and it will be sent to you once you've confirmed your subscription. You can always request a mail-back of your password when you edit your personal options.

    Pick a password:  
    Reenter password to confirm:  
    Which language do you prefer to display your messages? English (USA)  
    Would you like to receive list mail batched in a daily digest? No Yes

SISLgram Subscribers
(The subscribers list is only available to the list administrator.)

Enter your admin address and password to visit the subscribers list:

Admin address: Password:   

To unsubscribe from SISLgram, get a password reminder, or change your subscription options enter your subscription email address:

If you leave the field blank, you will be prompted for your email address

SISLgram list run by emj at uci.edu
SISLgram administrative interface (requires authorization)
